name: Solitaire ⋆ Brain Puzzle Game
description:
Play the classic Solitaire and see how smart you are!

Here comes the popular card game you have enjoyed in the PC : the Klondike Solitaire or Patience. The game is designed to sharpen your mind and exercise your brain power.

The game has excellent features which you will love. It supports offline mode which means you don’t need to be online to play. It can display in either the portrait or landscape mode. There are many colorful backgrounds, card faces and card backs for you to choose during the gaming. It also provides undo and hint features so you don’t get stuck in the game. The game features various choices of game settings like 1/3 draw cards, Vegas mode and tap/drag to move which will greatly enhance your experience of playing.

The more game you played and finished, the sharper your mind will be!

Come download and play Solitaire for FREE now!
